object.name: UserRating
object.description: This object describes the rating of a user based on their Telegram Star spendings.
object.html_description: This object describes the rating of a user based on their Telegram Star spendings.
object.rst_description: This object describes the rating of a user based on their Telegram Star spendings.

annotations.description: Current level of the user, indicating their reliability when purchasing digital goods and services. A higher level suggests a more trustworthy customer; a negative level is likely reason for concern.
annotations.html_description: Current level of the user, indicating their reliability when purchasing digital goods and services. A higher level suggests a more trustworthy customer; a negative level is likely reason for concern.
annotations.rst_description: Current level of the user, indicating their reliability when purchasing digital goods and services. A higher level suggests a more trustworthy customer; a negative level is likely reason for concern.
annotations.name: level

annotations.description: Numerical value of the user's rating; the higher the rating, the better
annotations.html_description: Numerical value of the user's rating; the higher the rating, the better
annotations.rst_description: Numerical value of the user's rating; the higher the rating, the better
annotations.name: rating

annotations.description: The rating value required to get the current level
annotations.html_description: The rating value required to get the current level
annotations.rst_description: The rating value required to get the current level
annotations.name: current_level_rating

annotations.description: The rating value required to get to the next level; omitted if the maximum level was reached
annotations.html_description: Optional. The rating value required to get to the next level; omitted if the maximum level was reached
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The rating value required to get to the next level; omitted if the maximum level was reached
annotations.name: next_level_rating
